lines: Everything well with the investigation? I sent a man to keep watch by the Yawn, by the way. You need to head back down, just let the fellow know.
Omega will stop at nothing─not even massacre─to find a stronger foe... Whose damfool idea was it to program a thing like that?
When they thought to make a self-evolving weapon, didn't it occur to them that things might get out of hand? Hmph! If I ever meet the creators, I'd give 'em some choice words!
I have some of our best people deciphering the tomestone we retrieved from Omega's control room─you can browse their latest results on the terminal over there.

Rowena charged a pretty pile of gil to loan us a scholar to handle the translations, but I think I can chalk that up to “project expenses.” If that knowledge allows you even the slightest advantage, then no cost is too great...
I've taken excerpts from the chief's report on Omega and loaded them onto the terminal there. Feel free to take a look.
I would've liked to add Nero's observations as well, but that man is nowhere to be found. Did you know he sold Rowena the pattern for a new uniform!?
Oh, and speaking of nowhere to be found, I wonder how far Alpha has gone. Not outside of Eorzea, surely... You haven't spotted our little chick on your travels have you?
